text:
Hi everyone,

I am fetching data from HubDB table using hubl. In my table, there are 1067 rows, code not fetching data that is present after 1000 rows. I have just tested by counting the length (total rows) of hubdb table and it give me just 1000 as a number, but there are more rows. Why is this happening.  My important task is in blocked state due to this issue. Please help me to resolve. Thanks. Below are screenshots

HubDB returns 1000 rows max by default. If you need more, you have to define a limit yourself.

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/cms/hubl/functions#hubdb_table_rows>
